name: AVAILABLE NOW: Stormed Inn
description:
Stormed Inn is a short, character driven, turned-based fantasy RPG.
Play as sibling duo Millie and Rem as they find themselves holed up in a tavern after seeking refuge from a violent storm. Explore the Storm Inn, where you can fight or talk your way in and out of trouble.

Gamplay:

  • Explore the Storm Inn, a small yet lively tavern in a dock raised town. 
  • Watch as the tavern changes depending on the choices you make, with multiple endings to watch, including a TRUE ENDING, which leads to an epilogue! 
  • With more of the story revealed on each play-through, there's more than enough reasons to visit the Storm Inn!

Available for free now!

Credits: 
Team VisuStella (Plugins and Assets)
Riot Games (Music)
Rush Garcia (Music)
